biography: Paul Collins is an English actor that has been acting since the 1940s. His first major role was as the voice of John Darling in the 1953 Walt Disney Pictures animated film Peter Pan. He later appeared in episodes of Hawaii Five-0, Matlock, and Murphy Brown. He is best known for his recent recurring role in JAG, and as Dr. Dave Benson in Scrubs. Paul Collins can be seen in many films, including Art School Confidential and Evan Almighty.
name: Paul Collins
